    Research 101: Writing a paper
    A memoir from Emma Hamel about writing a research paper. This article is intended for everyone that has some research they need to publish but don’t know how/where to start.

    Research 101: Writing tips and tricks I
    A collection of various mathods and lessons for being more efficient at writing academic papers. Will be progressively updated over time by various authors.

  • December 21, 2022
    Using the campus cluster
    The campus cluster is a colletion of high-performance servers maintained by the NCSA. It is a utility we will use for our research so it’s important to learn to use it. This guide is a beginner document in using the CampusCluster but can be applicable to many high-performance computing systems.
    Read more »
